turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Cityplaza.
turn.1: Where was the food court located?
turn.2: The old food court, including Burger King, Oliver's Super Sandwiches, Mario's, Fairwood, were originally situated next to the ice rink.
turn.4: It was closed in 2001 and replaced by the another food court on the 3rd floor, called Food Republic.
turn.5: Is the food court still open?
turn.6: In Dec 2016, a new food court, TREATS, opened in the original shop of Maxim's Palace.
turn.7: What kind of food does the food court sell?
turn.8: It provides bread, cheese sandwiches, fresh juices, Hong Kong style barbecued food & noodles, pasta, salad, sushi, sashimi and bento.
turn.9: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: Two restaurants, Cha Cha Room (dim sum) and Minh & Kok (Vietnamese food) are also situated inside TREATS.
turn.11: Is there any other food-related services?
turn.12: Cityplaza has offered a three-hour free Wi-Fi access.
